block.p: Breene Pamela Farrington, the daughter of Abbie B. Hubert of Richmond, Va., and Stephen H. Farrington of Naples, Fla., was married yesterday to David Harrison Wesson, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Bruce F. Wesson of Summit, N.J. The Rev. Dr. John E. Miller performed the ceremony at St. Mary's Episcopal Church in Richmond, with Msgr. Martin S. Rauscher taking part.

Mrs. Wesson, 29, is the associate director of publicity for Viking Penguin in New York. She graduated from Trinity College in Hartford. Her father is the president of the Mansfield Capital Corporation, a real estate investment concern in Naples. She is the stepdaughter of Carol C. Farrington and of Dr. Juergen Hubert. The bride's great-grandfather Charles Dufur Berry was a founder of Quaker State Oil, which was in Oil City, Pa.

Breene Pamela Farrington, the daughter of Abbie B. Hubert of Richmond, Va., and Stephen H. Farrington of Naples, Fla., was married yesterday to David Harrison Wesson, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Bruce F. Wesson of Summit, N.J. The Rev. Dr. John E. Miller performed the ceremony at St. Mary's Episcopal Church in Richmond, with Msgr. Martin S. Rauscher taking part.

Mrs. Wesson, 29, is the associate director of publicity for Viking Penguin in New York. She graduated from Trinity College in Hartford. Her father is the president of the Mansfield Capital Corporation, a real estate investment concern in Naples. She is the stepdaughter of Carol C. Farrington and of Dr. Juergen Hubert. The bride's great-grandfather Charles Dufur Berry was a founder of Quaker State Oil, which was in Oil City, Pa.

Mr. Wesson, 28, is an associate in the stock research department, in New York, of UBS Warburg, the investment bank. His father is a managing partner in Galen Associates, a New York venture capital firm.
